node.title: BitTorrent Bundle: Staff Picks, Volume 2
node.content:
Staff Picks is dedicated to surfacing the best music, film, and art downloads on the Internet; digitally handmade by BitTorrent Publishers. Read on for this week’s finds.

Wild Ones
Wild Ones is a dream pop, portland-based band with members from diverse musical backgrounds. With influences in punk, classical, German techno and American R&B, their unique perspective blends seamlessly to create a lively, multi-dimensional sound. Download the Bundle to get songs from their latest album Keep it Safe free.


.

Mano de Dios
From Independent Spirit Productions, Mano de Dios is an award-winning short film about an Argentinean immigrant living illegally in Luxembourg for a great portion of his life. Our protagonist is alone and lonely, enduring constant daily struggles. Download the BitTorrent Bundle to experience the full short film.


.
.

Avery Watts
Avery Watts makes Hard Rock with positive messages. Watts mixes Rock/Metal riffs with Hip-hop beats, resulting in explosive, unforgettable sounds. Download the BitTorrent Bundle to get his entire album The Takeover, and a previously unreleased music video – free. Then, pass it along for friends to enjoy.


.
.
.

New to BitTorrent?
1. Download BitTorrent
2. Download your Bundle
3. Drag & Drop the Bundle file into BitTorrent
4. Once the download is complete, you’ll find the content of your Bundle in your Downloads folder.


About BitTorrent Bundle
BitTorrent Bundle is an alpha project made with and for the web’s creative community.

Creators can build their own BitTorrent Bundle and distribute their massive multi-media projects to 170 million BitTorrent users around the world. Each Bundle comes with a key; Fans can unlock artist content with an email address or a donation. Got ideas for the next BitTorrent Bundle? You can sign up here.
